review: Extra costs of use of stick should be more up front.
author: Stephen W Kelly

review: Outstanding device! Enjoying all the free movies and music prime has to offer! The selections of the movies are far better than Red Box! :-)
author: Manuel J.

review: Awesome!! Works great. Easy to install. My daughter enjoys hours of movies. Just got one for my Dad and another one for my bedroom.. Love it!!
author: Denise  Chambers

review: Very nice....but....some glitches,  like a skip on a old record in Hulu plus. Need to use my rogue for that app?
author: Bob Walters

review: About all I can say is..I Love it.I'm sure I will have many hours of enjoyment.
author: Barbara Sutton

review: bought this so I can watch my shows at my girlfriends house. Very happy with the fire stick. works great with Amazon Prime
author: michael wilkes

review: simple to install and use.  Wish it had volume control as well, but otherwise I love it.  Thank you, JW
author: Kindle Customer

review: I like it, however I'm pretty disappointed that I bought this and STILL have to pay to use it. And on top of that, I even purchased the Amazon Prime ($99) and STILL have to pay to view basic shows I wanted to watch. Wish I would've know this info before I purchased it.  Seems kind of pointless to have it if I still have to pay to use it.
author: Wendi Elder

review: Does this have any regular tv channels? Like any sports channels?
author: Stephanie Davis

review: Excellent product. Easy to set up and to use.
author: Diana Turek-Gever
